verbose_text: To establish whether the interaction between BMP4 and IL-7 regulates the number of IELs, exogenous BMP4 (30 ng/ml) and IL-7 (2 ng/ml) proteins were added to cultured IELs for 6 h. Flow cytometry demonstrated that treatment with IL-7 reduced the extent of apoptosis of IELs (11.1 +/-0.93%), and enhanced the apoptosis of IELs in the presence of BMP4 (11.8 +/-0.47%).
